subject: URGENT: Q3 Report Due Today
body:
Hi,

I need the Q3 financial report on my desk by 5 PM today. No excuses. We have a board meeting tomorrow morning.

Thanks,
Boss

subject: CONGRATULATIONS! You won $1,000,000
body:
Dear Winner,

You have been selected to receive a grand prize. Click here to claim your money now! send bank details immediately.

subject: Weekly Tech: AI is taking over?
body: This week in tech: Google releases new Gemini models, Python 3.13 updates, and the future of quantum computing. Read more...

subject: Project Delta: Delay in delivery
body:
Hi team,

Unfortunately, due to supply chain issues, the components for Project Delta will be delayed by 2 weeks. We need to reschedule the milestone review.

subject: Invitation: Sync w/ Marketing @ Mon Oct 30 2pm
body:
You have been invited to the following event.

Sync w/ Marketing
When: Mon Oct 30, 2pm - 3pm
Where: Room 404

subject: Sunday Lunch?
body: Hey honey, are you free this Sunday? I'm making lasagna. Let me know!

subject: Your AWS Bill is Ready
body: Your invoice for October 2023 is ready. Total: $45.20. Log in to view details.

subject: Opportunity at AI Startup
body: Hi there, I saw your profile and thought you'd be a great fit for our Senior Engineer role. Let's chat?

subject: Fwd: Re: Project Delta Delay
body:
FYI - see below. We need to update the Gantt chart ASAP.

> From: sarah.j@client.com
> Subject: Project Delta: Delay in delivery
> ...delayed by 2 weeks...

subject: Open Enrollment Begins Today
body: Team, it's that time of year again. Please select your health insurance plans by Nov 15th.

subject: Phishing Alert
body: Please be aware of a recent phishing campaign targeting employees. Do not click links from unknown senders.

subject: Your package has been delivered
body: Good news! Your package was left at the front door. See photo proof attached.

subject: Code Review Request: PR #405
body: Can you take a look at my PR when you have a sec? It fixes the login bug. Needs merge by EOD.

subject: Your subscription is expiring
body: We miss you. Come back for $1/week.

subject: Town Hall Tomorrow
body: All hands meeting tomorrow at 10 AM. I will be discussing the new strategic direction.
